reviews.review_msg: niall is amazing!! this prof was one of the most sweetest and most knowledgeable people ever! I found his lectures + readings chosen super interesting and insightful. Quizzes were a bit tricky (required very thorough readings) but essays, midterm, and projects were very straightforward. make sure to speak up during class for participation points
Very boring class. He will put you to sleep. I have had much more interesting english teachers in highschool. Quite a bit of reading.
